skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
Long has peace in the Old World been bought with the blood of Kislev. When Ruination descends, none are more ready to meet it than the hardy guardians of the north.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summoned unit has increased melee attack and melee defence
Summoned unit has greatly increased melee attack and melee defence

skillTree.localised_description: There's nowhere to run once the Snow Leopards begin their hunt. Only close your eyes and hope you are not their prey.

effects.description:
Speed: +20% for Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Ice Queen rules from a majestic frozen palace, where whole chambers are carved from the most potent ice magic.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Ice spells
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Crystal Sanctuary Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Death Frost Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Heart of Winter Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Cold and deadly – Katarin is the personification of winter itself, and armoured in its biting chill.
The oncoming tide of Chaos never ceases, yet Kislev will never fail to rise up and fight against it.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A hastened stream of ice and snow flows with the Tzarina, moving as one with the frigid wind.
Though stemming from superstition bred from whispers alone, there are many that believe Katarin to be Miska, the glorious first Khan-Queen, reborn.
Small walls and mountains of ice are known to spring from the ground around Katarin, a frozen bulwark against the deadliest of threats.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Ice Maiden's Kiss"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ice Maiden's Kiss Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Ice Maiden's Kiss Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ice Sheet"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Frost Blades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Frost Blades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Frost Blades Upgraded"

Miscast base chance: -15% for "Death Frost Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Crystal Sanctuary"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Crystal Sanctuary Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Crystal Sanctuary Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Heart of Winter"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Heart of Winter Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Heart of Winter Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Again, again, again! We'll practice this until your fingers bleed!"

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units

Reload time reduction: +9% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars and Streltsi units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "There's ice in the veins of the mighty Guards of Kislev, or so the rumour goes…"

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Tzar Guard and Ice Guard units

skillTree.localised_description: The thunderous pounding of Kislevite hooves can be heard for leagues around, even muffled by the crunch of fresh snow.

Missile strength: +8% for Horse Archers units

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts that roam the forests of Kislev are somehow even more lethal than the land they inhabit.

Melee attack: +4 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear and Snow Leopard units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kislevite craftsmen toil night and day, tinkering with contraptions to help repel the forces of Chaos.

effects.description:
Armour: +8 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds and Little Grom units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The warriors of the north carry conflict in their blood, a legacy left by the Khan-Kings and Khan-Queens of old.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Descended of the proud horse-warriors of the Gospodar, all Kislevites are born to the saddle like their ancestors before them.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Ursun is with us, brothers! None can stand against the beasts of the Bear-God!"

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear, Snow Leopard and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bears, Snow Leopard and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The workshops of the north are always busy, their engineers working tirelessly in the pursuit of battle excellence.

Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

factionEffects.localised_description: From the icy fastness of her capital city of Kislev, the Ice Queen Katarin rules her land with an aloof majesty.

effects.description: Devotion generated: 10 from successful Frost Maiden Hero actions
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Frost Maidens

items.colour_text: Made for the Khan-Queens in ages past, this swirling mist of ice and crystals surrounds the Tzarina, protecting her from harm.
A single blow landed with this truly deadly magic sword is enough to fell even mighty beasts.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Kislev is the people, and the people are Kislev!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -50% for Ice Guard units
	(Lord's army)
